programme.title: 2025 Players' Roundtable: Kavanagh brothers, Shellenberger, Dobson, Reh & McAdorey
programme.desc: Six of the best players in the game sat down for a conversation about their biggest challenges, top accomplishments, and what it’s like being a pro lacrosse player today — on and off the field.

programme.title: Mitchell Pehlke Lacrosse Show
programme.desc: Welcome to Episode 26 of the Mitchell Pehlke Lacrosse Show presented by Duke Cannon! Trevor Baptiste joins the show! He breaks down his journey with the Atlas, and if they have what it takes to win a championship this year. The boys breakdown week 7 craziness. Are the Outlaws the best PLL team in recent memory? Do the Cannons have an Asher problem? How are the Dogs planning on using CJ Kirst this late in the season? Doogs has an updated should've been MVP rankings. Kev breaks down the PLL challenge rule, as some seem confused on the matter. Brennan O'neill's ridiculous goal plays a part in this weeks Start Bench Cut.
